name: Tower Jumper (oeloe1)
description:
A prototype for a simple 2D platformer made in Unity: get to the top of the tower while avoiding enemies and other hazards. Collect pickups for points, and decide whether you want to go for the challenging ones, or have a more casual playthrough.

If you want to try out this game, I recommend downloading the Windows version, as I have not extensively tested the WEBGL version.
